article:
Swimming is enjoyed by people of all ages, from the young to the old. All over the  _  people swim for fun. There are many  _  where people can enjoy swimming. People swim in lakes, oceans, and  _ . Some swim in pools. Many schools, apartment buildings and clubs  _  indoor or outdoor pools. Some families have pools in their  _ .
Swimming is one of  the best  forms of exercise. It can improve heart action. It helps blood circulate  . Swimming can  _  develop strong muscles . It will even strengthen the lungs . People who are  _  and can't enjoy other sports can keep their bodies in better condition by  _ .
It is a good idea for  _  to learn to swim at an early age. This will be an activity that the children can enjoy for the rest of  _  lives. There are some basic rules for water safety that you must  _ . First of all, know how to swim. Many  _  give lessons to children. Adults can learn to swim at public pools or recreation  centers. Another rule to remember is never swim  _ . Always swim with a friend and know that person is in the water at all times. It is best to swim only in places  _  there is a lifeguard. If you swim in the ocean or a river, it is good to know about tides  and currents .
